thread.title: The adidas Equipment Support ADV Returns In Banger ‘Hot Pink’ Colorway
thread.title_full: The adidas Equipment Support ADV Returns In Banger ‘Hot Pink’ Colorway

author: David Fischer
title: The adidas Equipment Support ADV Returns In Banger ‘Hot Pink’ Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
When we presented this new pink version of the Saint Laurent “Teddy” jacket we told you already that pink was the new hot color to watch. It has been for a short minute and it seems like a lot of brands are catching on. Now adidas Originals also decided to give its Equipment Support ADV a full hot pink colorway. The sneaker is completely tonal, similar to this recent royal blue version . You can pick up the sneaker now from SneakerPolitics .
